column4: hi. i have a problem when saving nvidia X conf. i got an error msg like this " Failed to parse existing X config file '/etc/X11/xorg.conf'! ". i already try with gksudo nvidia-settings and gksu nvidia-settings, but it doesn't fix the problem. how can i overwrite this file? thank you ;)

hi. i have a problem when saving nvidia X conf. i got an error msg like this " Failed to parse existing X config file '/etc/X11/xorg.conf'! ". i already try with gksudo nvidia-settings and gksu nvidia-settings, but it doesn't fix the problem. how can i overwrite this file? thank you ;)
since xorg.conf won't exist, write the new one to different location and copy it later by hand
